Desc.eng: Van Helsing! Right… in time. … the Vodyanoy frogs attacked us… I’m the last of my squadron. There is a boat on the river… with the weapons shipment for the Resistance… waiting for the signal.
I could fly over the water! Would that work?
No, they are waiting… for the signal from the lighthouse. Climb the stairs, turn on the light… Will you do that?
I’m really sorry, friend, but the Resistance needs us elsewhere.
